bstfun 0.2.4.9004
  • Reference

Moves p-value footnotes to individual p-values

Source: R/gts_add_p_footnotes.R
gts_add_p_footnotes.Rd

gts_add_p_footnotes(x, printer = NULL, index_start = NULL)

Arguments

x

object with class "tbl_summary" created from the gtsummary package
printer

DEPRECATED
index_start

DEPRECATED

Example Output

See also

Other gtsummary-related functions: add_inline_forest_plot(), as_ggplot(), gtsummary_butcher(), style_tbl_compact(), tbl_2way_summary(), tbl_split(), theme_gtsummary_msk()

Examples

library(gtsummary)
gts_add_p_footnotes_ex1 <-
  trial %>%
  select(trt, age, grade) %>%
  tbl_summary(by = trt) %>%
  add_p() %>%
  gts_add_p_footnotes()
